thread.section_title: Jomashop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jomashop | www.jomashop.com | 4 of 281
thread.title: A Lewin

author: A Lewin
title: A Lewin
text: I was quite dubious about buying anything outside the UK but found that the Michael Kors watch I wanted was Â£90 cheaper with Jomashop. I paid through paypal and was amazed at how quick I received the item. After getting a letter to say I had to pay import tax and paying for it on line, it was with me two days later. All in all took around 10 days but I had no problems what so ever. Absolutely fantastic customer service and would definitely tell anyone else to order from them. Thank you once again for saving me quite a bit of money
